approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task. The system should store the task description.

requirements.title: Task Listing Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. Each task in the list should display the task description.

requirements.title: Performance - Task Creation
requirements.description: The system shall create a new task within a reasonable timeframe. The task creation process should not noticeably impact the user experience.

requirements.title: Data Persistence
requirements.description: The system shall persist the created tasks so that they are available to the user across sessions.

requirements.title: A user can create a new task with a text descripti
requirements.description: A user can create a new task with a text description.

requirements.title: A user can see a list of all created tasks.
requirements.description: A user can see a list of all created tasks.

requirements.title: The application must load quickly.
requirements.description: The application must load quickly.

requirements.title: The application must be secure.
requirements.description: The application must be secure.
